summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to apply to King County for funds from the Waterways 2000 Urban Program funded by the King County Conservation Futures Tax Program; authorizing acceptance of funds received from King County and deposit in the Conservation Futures Fund; authorizing the Mayor to amend the Interlocal Cooperation Agreement between The City of Seattle and King County authorized by Ordinance 114978; authorizing property acquisitions; and making an appropriation from the Conservation Futures Fund.
